titleStmt.title: A sermon preached Decemb. 16. 1654. At the funerall of Mr Andrevv Pern, preacher of the Word of God at Wilby in Northampton-shire. By Samuel Ainsworth rector of Kelmarsh.
titleStmt.author: Ainsworth, Samuel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for William Gilberton, and are to be sold by Thomas Collins neare Alhallows Church in Northampton,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
